comment: * Builder for creating device light change requests.

methods.name: public Builder addLight(@NonNull Light light, @NonNull LightState state)
methods.comment:
* Overrides the color and intensity of a given light.
         *
         * @param light the light to modify
         * @param state the desired color and intensity of the light

methods.name: public Builder setLight(@NonNull Light light, @NonNull LightState state)
methods.comment:
* Overrides the color and intensity of a given light.
         *
         * @param light the light to modify
         * @param state the desired color and intensity of the light         *
         * @deprecated Use {@link #addLight(Light, LightState)} instead.
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder clearLight(@NonNull Light light)
methods.comment:
* Removes the override for the color and intensity of a given light.
         *
         * @param light the light to modify

methods.name: public LightsRequest build()
methods.comment:
* Create a LightsRequest object used to override lights on the device. * *

The generated {@link LightsRequest} should be used in * {@link LightsManager.Session#requestLights(LightsLightsRequest).
